title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.109 - Wende Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.109 - Wende Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
in the department an institution to be known as Wende Correctional Facility, which shall be located in the Town of Alden in Erie County and which shall
consist of property under the jurisdiction of the department. (b) Wende Correctional Facility shall be a
correctional facility for males 18 years of age or older. (c) Wende Correctional Facility shall be
classified as a maximum security facility, to be used for the following
functions: (1)
general confinement
facility; (2)
detention center; and
(3)
residential treatment
facility in that portion of the facility functioning as the regional medical
unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.109

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
